data.name: Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts - Wallpaper Pack
data.detailed_description:
With this DLC you can grab a couple of wallpapers associated with the game Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts in which you can play as a paid assassin - a hit man for hire, and need to beware of rival snipers who won’t hesitate to disrupt your best-laid plans. Download wallpaper pack and choose between the 4K and HD. Become even more immersed with the game by downloading free wallpapers and feel like the ultimate assassin in the most realistic modern warfare.

Once downloaded, wallpapers are available inside the main game folder:
SteamLibrary/steamapps/common/Sniper Ghost Warrior Contacts/Wallpapers
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Free downloadable content for the Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts community and Sniper series lovers - themed wallpapers. This content requires the base game Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts on Steam.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Czech, Korean, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4460 / AMD FX 6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
